   20: 
   21: %%
   22: -module(openssl_client_cert_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   26: 
   27: %% Common test
   28: -export([all/0,
   29:          groups/0,
   30:          init_per_suite/1,
   31:          init_per_group/2,
   32:          init_per_testcase/2,
   33:          end_per_suite/1,
   34:          end_per_group/2,
   35:          end_per_testcase/2
   36:         ]).
   37: 
   38: %% Test cases
   39: -export([no_auth/0,
   40:          no_auth/1,
   41:          auth/0,
   42:          auth/1,
   43:          client_auth_empty_cert_accepted/0,
   44:          client_auth_empty_cert_accepted/1,
   45:          client_auth_empty_cert_rejected/0,
   46:          client_auth_empty_cert_rejected/1,
   47:          client_auth_use_partial_chain/0,
   48:          client_auth_use_partial_chain/1,
   49:          client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain/0,
   50:          client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain/1,
   51:          client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail/0,
   52:          client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail/1,
   53:          missing_root_cert_no_auth/0,
   54:          missing_root_cert_no_auth/1,
   55:          unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth/0,
   56:          unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth/1,
   57:          unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth/0,
   58:          unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth/1,
   59:          hello_retry_request/0,
   60:          hello_retry_request/1,
   61:          custom_groups/0,
   62:          custom_groups/1,
   63:          hello_retry_client_auth/0,
   64:          hello_retry_client_auth/1,
   65:          hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted/0,
   66:          hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted/1,
   67:          hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected/0,
   68:          hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected/1
   69:         ]).
   70: 
   71: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   72: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   73: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   74: all() ->
   75:     [
   76:      {group,  openssl_client}
   77:     ].
   78: 
   79: groups() ->
   80:     [
   81:      {openssl_client, [], protocol_groups()},
   82:      {'tlsv1.3', [], tls_1_3_protocol_groups()},
   83:      {'tlsv1.2', [], pre_tls_1_3_protocol_groups() ++ [{group, ecdsa}, {group, rsa_pss_rsae}, {group, rsa_pss_pss}]},
   84:      {'tlsv1.1', [], pre_tls_1_3_protocol_groups()},
   85:      {'tlsv1', [], pre_tls_1_3_protocol_groups()},
   86:      {'dtlsv1.2', [], pre_tls_1_3_protocol_groups() ++ [{group, ecdsa}]},
   87:      {'dtlsv1', [], pre_tls_1_3_protocol_groups()},
   88:      {rsa, [], all_version_tests()},
   89:      {ecdsa, [], all_version_tests()},
   90:      {dsa, [], all_version_tests()},
   91:      {rsa_1_3, [], all_version_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests() ++ [unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth,
   92:                                                               unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth]},
   93:      {rsa_pss_rsae, [], all_version_tests()},
   94:      {rsa_pss_pss, [], all_version_tests()},
   95:      {rsa_pss_rsae_1_3, [], all_version_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests()},
   96:      {rsa_pss_pss_1_3, [], all_version_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests()},
   97:      {ecdsa_1_3, [], all_version_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests()},
   98:      {eddsa_1_3, [], all_version_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests()}
   99:     ].
  100: 
  101: protocol_groups() ->
  102:     case ssl_test_lib:openssl_sane_dtls() of
  103:         true ->
  104:             [{group, 'tlsv1.3'},
  105:              {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
  106:              {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
  107:              {group, 'tlsv1'},
  108:              {group, 'dtlsv1.2'},
  109:              {group, 'dtlsv1'}];
  110:         false ->
  111:             [{group, 'tlsv1.3'},
  112:              {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
  113:              {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
  114:              {group, 'tlsv1'}
  115:             ]
  116:      end.
  117: 
  118: pre_tls_1_3_protocol_groups() ->
  119:     [{group, rsa},
  120:      {group, dsa}].
  121: 
  122: tls_1_3_protocol_groups() ->
  123:     [{group, rsa_1_3},
  124:      {group, rsa_pss_rsae_1_3},
  125:      {group, rsa_pss_pss_1_3},
  126:      {group, ecdsa_1_3},
  127:      {group, eddsa_1_3}
  128:     ].
  129: 
  130: tls_1_3_tests() ->
  131:     [
  132:      hello_retry_request,
  133:      custom_groups,
  134:      hello_retry_client_auth,
  135:      hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted,
  136:      hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected
  137:     ].
  138: 
  139: all_version_tests() ->
  140:     [
  141:      no_auth,
  142:      auth,
  143:      client_auth_empty_cert_accepted,
  144:      client_auth_empty_cert_rejected,
  145:      client_auth_use_partial_chain,
  146:      client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain,
  147:      client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail,
  148:      missing_root_cert_no_auth
  149:     ].
  150: 
  151: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
  152:     Config = ssl_test_lib:init_per_suite(Config0, openssl),
  153:     case ssl_test_lib:working_openssl_client(Config) of
  154:         true -> Config;
  155:         false -> throw({skip, "Broken OpenSSL s_client"})
  156:     end.
  157: 
  158: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  159:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_suite(Config).
  160: 
  161: init_per_group(openssl_client, Config) ->
  162:     [{client_type, openssl}, {server_type, erlang} | Config];
  163: 
  164: init_per_group(Group, Config0) when Group == rsa;
  165:                                     Group == rsa_1_3 ->
  166:     Config = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config0),
  167:     COpts = proplists:get_value(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  168:     SOpts = proplists:get_value(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  169:     %% Make sure _rsa* suite is chosen by ssl_test_lib:start_server
  170:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  171:     Ciphers = ssl_cert_tests:test_ciphers(fun(dhe_rsa) ->
  172:                                                   true;
  173:                                              (ecdhe_rsa) ->
  174:                                                   true;
  175:                                              (_) ->
  176:                                                   false
  177:                                           end, Version),
  178:     case Ciphers of
  179:         [_|_] ->
  180:             [{cert_key_alg, rsa} |
  181:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  182:                           [{client_cert_opts, [{ciphers, Ciphers} | COpts]},
  183:                            {server_cert_opts, SOpts} |
  184:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  185:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))])];
  186:         [] ->
  187:             {skip, {no_sup, Group, Version}}
  188:     end;
  189: init_per_group(Alg, Config) when
  190:       Alg == rsa_pss_rsae;
  191:       Alg == rsa_pss_pss;
  192:       Alg == rsa_pss_rsae_1_3;
  193:       Alg == rsa_pss_pss_1_3 ->
  194:     Supports = crypto:supports(),
  195:     RSAOpts = proplists:get_value(rsa_opts, Supports),
  196:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
  197: 
  198:     case lists:member(rsa_pkcs1_pss_padding, RSAOpts)
  199:         andalso lists:member(rsa_pss_saltlen, RSAOpts)
  200:         andalso lists:member(rsa_mgf1_md, RSAOpts)
  201:         andalso ssl_test_lib:is_sane_oppenssl_pss(rsa_alg(Alg))
  202:     of
  203:         true ->
  204:             #{client_config := COpts,
  205:               server_config := SOpts} = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_pss_pem(rsa_alg(Alg), [], Config, ""),
  206:             [{cert_key_alg, rsa_alg(Alg)} |
  207:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  208:                           [{client_cert_opts, openssl_sig_algs(rsa_alg(Alg)) ++ COpts},
  209:                            {server_cert_opts, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(Alg, Version) ++ SOpts} |
  210:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  211:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))])];
  212:         false ->
  213:             {skip, "Missing crypto or OpenSSL support"}
  214:     end;
  215: init_per_group(Group, Config0) when Group == ecdsa;
  216:                                     Group == ecdsa_1_3 ->
  217:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  218:     case lists:member(ecdsa, PKAlg) andalso (lists:member(ecdh, PKAlg) orelse
  219:                                              lists:member(dh, PKAlg))
  220:         andalso (ssl_test_lib:openssl_ecdsa_suites() =/= [])
  221:     of
  222:         true ->
  223:             Config = ssl_test_lib:make_ecdsa_cert(Config0),
  224:             COpts = proplists:get_value(client_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  225:             SOpts = proplists:get_value(server_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  226:             %% Make sure ecdh* suite is chosen by ssl_test_lib:start_server
  227:             Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  228:             Ciphers =  ssl_cert_tests:test_ciphers(fun(ecdh_ecdsa) ->
  229:                                                            true;
  230:                                                       (ecdhe_ecdsa) ->
  231:                                                            true;
  232:                                                       (_) ->
  233:                                                            false
  234:                                                    end, Version),
  235:             case Ciphers of
  236:                 [_|_] ->
  237:                     [{cert_key_alg, ecdsa} |
  238:                      lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  239:                                   [{client_cert_opts, [{ciphers, Ciphers} | COpts]},
  240:                                    {server_cert_opts, SOpts} |
  241:                                    lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  242:                                                 lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))]
  243:                                  )];
  244:                         [] ->
  245:                     {skip, {no_sup, Group, Version}}
  246:             end;
  247:         false ->
  248:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  249:     end;
  250: init_per_group(eddsa_1_3, Config0) ->
  251:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  252:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config0),
  253:     case lists:member(eddsa, PKAlg) andalso
  254:         (lists:member(ecdh, PKAlg) andalso
  255:          lists:member(ecdsa, PKAlg)) of
  256:         true ->
  257:             Conf = public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf(),
  258:                                                                  intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()],
  259:                                                                  peer =>  ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()},
  260:                                                %% OpenSSL does currently not support EDDSA private key files
  261:                                                client_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf(),
  262:                                                                  intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf()],
  263:                                                                  peer =>  ssl_test_lib:ecdsa_conf()}}),
  264:             [{server_config, SOpts},
  265:              {client_config, COpts}] = x509_test:gen_pem_config_files(Conf, filename:join(PrivDir,
  266:                                                                                           "client_ecdsa_missing_eddsa"),
  267:                                                                       filename:join(PrivDir, "server_eddsa")),
  268: 
  269:             [{cert_key_alg, eddsa} |
  270:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  271:                           [{client_cert_opts, COpts},
  272:                            {server_cert_opts, SOpts} |
  273:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  274:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config0))]
  275:                          )];
  276:         false ->
  277:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  278:     end;
  279: init_per_group(Group, Config0) when Group == dsa ->
  280:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  281:     NVersion = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config0)),
  282:     SigAlgs = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(dsa, NVersion),
  283:     case lists:member(dss, PKAlg) andalso lists:member(dh, PKAlg)
  284:         andalso (ssl_test_lib:openssl_dsa_suites() =/= [])
  285:         andalso (ssl_test_lib:check_sane_openssl_dsa(Config0))
  286:     of
  287:         true ->
  288:             Config = ssl_test_lib:make_dsa_cert(Config0),
  289:             COpts = SigAlgs ++ proplists:get_value(client_dsa_opts, Config),
  290:             SOpts = SigAlgs ++ proplists:get_value(server_dsa_opts, Config),
  291:             %% Make sure dhe_dss* suite is chosen by ssl_test_lib:start_server
  292:             Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  293:             Ciphers =  ssl_cert_tests:test_ciphers(fun(dh_dss) ->
  294:                                                            true;
  295:                                                       (dhe_dss) ->
  296:                                                            true;
  297:                                                       (_) ->
  298:                                                            false
  299:                                                    end, Version),
  300:             case Ciphers of
  301:                 [_|_] ->
  302:                     [{cert_key_alg, dsa} |
  303:                      lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  304:                                   [{client_cert_opts, [{ciphers, Ciphers} | COpts]},
  305:                                    {server_cert_opts, [{ciphers, Ciphers} | SOpts]} |
  306:                                    lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  307:                                                 lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))])];
  308:                 [] ->
  309:                     {skip, {no_sup, Group, Version}}
  310:             end;
  311:         false ->
  312:             {skip, "Missing DSS crypto support"}
  313:     end;
  314: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  315:     ssl_test_lib:init_per_group_openssl(GroupName, Config).
  316: 
  317: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  318:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  319: 
  320: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config) when
  321:       TestCase == client_auth_empty_cert_accepted;
  322:       TestCase == client_auth_empty_cert_rejected ->
  323:     Version = ssl_test_lib:protocol_version(Config),
  324: 
  325:     case Version of
  326:         sslv3 ->
  327:             %% Openssl client sends "No Certificate Reserved" warning ALERT
  328:             %% instead of sending EMPTY cert message in SSL-3.0 so empty cert test are not
  329:             %% relevant
  330:             {skip, openssl_behaves_differently};
  331:         _ ->
  332:             ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  333:             ct:timetrap({seconds, 30}),
  334:             Config
  335:     end;
  336: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  337:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  338:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 30}),
  339:     Config.
  340: 
  341: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  342:     Config.
  343: 
  344: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  345: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  346: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  347: 
  348: no_auth() ->
  349:      ssl_cert_tests:no_auth().
  350: 
  351: no_auth(Config) ->
  352:       ssl_cert_tests:no_auth(Config).
  353: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  354: auth() ->
  355:     ssl_cert_tests:auth().
  356: auth(Config) ->
  357:     ssl_cert_tests:auth(Config).
  358: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  359: client_auth_empty_cert_accepted() ->
  360:      ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_empty_cert_accepted().
  361: client_auth_empty_cert_accepted(Config) ->
  362:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_empty_cert_accepted(Config).
  363: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  364: client_auth_empty_cert_rejected() ->
  365:       ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_empty_cert_rejected().
  366: client_auth_empty_cert_rejected(Config) ->
  367:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_empty_cert_rejected(Config).
  368: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  369: %%  Have to use partial chain functionality on side running Erlang (we are not testing OpenSSL features)
  370: client_auth_use_partial_chain() ->
  371:     [{doc, "Server does not trust an intermediat CA and fails the connetion as ROOT has expired"}].
  372: client_auth_use_partial_chain(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  373:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  374:     Group = proplists:get_value(name, Prop),
  375:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
  376:     Alg = proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  377:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_ecc_cert_chain_conf(Group),
  378:     Ciphers = appropriate_ciphers(Group, Version),
  379: 
  380:     {Year, Month, Day} = date(),
  381:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  382:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_pem(Alg,
  383:                                                                         [{client_chain,
  384:                                                                           [[{validity, {{Year-2, Month, Day},
  385:                                                                                         {Year-1, Month, Day}}}],
  386:                                                                            [],
  387:                                                                            []
  388:                                                                           ]},
  389:                                                                          {server_chain, DefaultCertConf}],
  390:                                                                         Config, "use_partial_chain"),
  391:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config),
  392:     CaCertsFile = proplists:get_value(cacertfile, ClientOpts),
  393:     ClientCACerts = [DerCA  ||  {'Certificate', DerCA, _} <- ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(CaCertsFile)],
  394:     [_, IntermidiateCA, _] = ClientCACerts,
  395:     PartialChain =  fun(CertChain) ->
  396: 			    case lists:member(IntermidiateCA, CertChain) of
  397: 				true ->
  398: 				    {trusted_ca, IntermidiateCA};
  399: 				false ->
  400: 				    unknown_ca
  401: 			    end
  402: 		    end,
  403:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}, {partial_chain, PartialChain} |
  404:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, [{ciphers, Ciphers} | ServerOpts0], Config)],
  405:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  406: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  407: %%  Have to use partial chain functionality on side running Erlang (we are not testing OpenSSL features)
  408: client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain() ->
  409:    ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain().
  410: client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  411:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  412:     Group = proplists:get_value(name, Prop),
  413:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_ecc_cert_chain_conf(Group),
  414:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
  415:     Alg = proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  416:     Ciphers = appropriate_ciphers(Group, Version),
  417: 
  418:     {Year, Month, Day} = date(),
  419:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  420:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_pem(Alg,
  421:                                                                         [{client_chain,
  422:                                                                           [[{validity, {{Year-2, Month, Day},
  423:                                                                                         {Year-1, Month, Day}}}],
  424:                                                                            [],
  425:                                                                            []
  426:                                                                           ]},
  427:                                                                          {server_chain, DefaultCertConf}], Config, "do_not_use_partial_chain"),
  428:     PartialChain =  fun(_CertChain) ->
  429: 			    unknown_ca
  430: 		    end,
  431:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config),
  432:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}, {partial_chain, PartialChain} |
  433:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server,  [{ciphers, Ciphers} | ServerOpts0], Config)],
  434:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, certificate_expired).
  435: 
  436: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  437: %%  Have to use partial chain functionality on side running Erlang (we are not testing OpenSSL features)
  438: client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail() ->
  439:    ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail().
  440: client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  441:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  442:     Group = proplists:get_value(name, Prop),
  443:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_ecc_cert_chain_conf(Group),
  444:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
  445:     Alg = proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  446:     Ciphers = appropriate_ciphers(Group, Version),
  447: 
  448:     {Year, Month, Day} = date(),
  449:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  450:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_pem(Alg,
  451:                                                                         [{client_chain,
  452:                                                                           [[{validity, {{Year-2, Month, Day},
  453:                                                                                         {Year-1, Month, Day}}}],
  454:                                                                            [],
  455:                                                                            []
  456:                                                                           ]},
  457:                                                                          {server_chain, DefaultCertConf}], Config, "partial_chain_fun_fail"),
  458:     PartialChain = fun(_CertChain) ->
  459:                            error(crash_on_purpose)
  460:                    end,
  461:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config),
  462:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}, {partial_chain, PartialChain} |
  463:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server,  [{ciphers, Ciphers} | ServerOpts0], Config)],
  464:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, certificate_expired).
  465: 
  466: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  467: missing_root_cert_no_auth() ->
  468:    ssl_cert_tests:missing_root_cert_no_auth().
  469: missing_root_cert_no_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  470:     ssl_cert_tests:missing_root_cert_no_auth(Config).
  471: 
  472: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  473: %% TLS 1.3 Test Cases ------------------------------------------------
  474: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  475: hello_retry_request() ->
  476:     ssl_cert_tests:hello_retry_request().
  477: hello_retry_request(Config) ->
  478:     ssl_cert_tests:hello_retry_request(Config).
  479: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  480: custom_groups() ->
  481:  ssl_cert_tests:custom_groups().
  482: custom_groups(Config) ->
  483:   ssl_cert_tests:custom_groups(Config).
  484: unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth() ->
  485:  ssl_cert_tests:unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth().
  486: unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth(Config) ->
  487:     ssl_cert_tests:unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth(Config).
  488: unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth() ->
  489:  ssl_cert_tests:unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth().
  490: unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth(Config) ->
  491:     ssl_cert_tests:unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth(Config).
  492: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  493: hello_retry_client_auth() ->
  494:  ssl_cert_tests:hello_retry_client_auth().
  495: hello_retry_client_auth(Config) ->
  496:   ssl_cert_tests:hello_retry_client_auth(Config).
  497: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  498: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted() ->
  499:     ssl_cert_tests:hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted().
  500: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted(Config) ->
  501:     ssl_cert_tests:hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted(Config).
  502: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  503: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected() ->
  504:     ssl_cert_tests:hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected().
  505: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected(Config) ->
  506:    ssl_cert_tests:hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected(Config).
  507: 
  508: rsa_alg(rsa_pss_rsae_1_3) ->
  509:     rsa_pss_rsae;
  510: rsa_alg(rsa_pss_pss_1_3) ->
  511:     rsa_pss_pss;
  512: rsa_alg(Atom) ->
  513:     Atom.
  514: 
  515: openssl_sig_algs(rsa_pss_pss) ->
  516:     [{sigalgs, "rsa_pss_pss_sha256"}];
  517: openssl_sig_algs(rsa_pss_rsae) ->
  518:     [{sigalgs,"rsa_pss_rsae_sha256"}];
  519: openssl_sig_algs(rsa_pss_pss_1_3) ->
  520:     [{sigalgs, "rsa_pss_rsae_sha512:rsa_pss_rsae_sha384:rsa_pss_pss_sha256"}];
  521: openssl_sig_algs(rsa_pss_rsae_1_3) ->
  522:     [{sigalgs,"rsa_pss_rsae_sha512:rsa_pss_rsae_sha384:rsa_pss_rsae_sha256"}].
  523: 
  524: appropriate_ciphers(dsa, Version) ->
  525:     ssl:cipher_suites(all, Version);
  526: appropriate_ciphers(_, Version) ->
  527:     ssl:cipher_suites(default, Version).
